towers

Class IceTower

  • java.lang.Object
    • tilemap.Tile
      • towers.TowerBase
        • towers.IceTower
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TowerInterface

    public class IceTower
extends TowerBase
    This is one kind of tower named Ice Tower. The Ice Tower has its own image and type and other common attributes. It will be used in the later builds
    Author:
    Yulong Song, Xunrong Xia

    • Constructor Detail

      • IceTower

        public IceTower()
        This is the constructor of IceTower class. Some default values of the Ice Tower's features has been assigned.

      • IceTower

        public IceTower(int tileX,
                int tileY,
                int tileWidth,
                int tileHeight)
        This constructor would assign the value of tile's attributes.
        Parameters:
        tileX - The X coordinate of the tile.
        tileY - The Y coordinate of the tile.
        tileWidth - The width of the tile.
        tileHeight - The height of the tile.

    • Method Detail

      • upgrade

        public void upgrade()
        The override method of upgrade(). When an Ice Tower upgrade, it's power would increase 5, level would increase 1. The upgradeCost would increase 110.

      • update

        public void update()
        Specified by:
        update in class TowerBase

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        To draw special effect on critter if it was attacked by ice tower.
        Specified by:
        draw in class TowerBase

      • fire

        public void fire(CritterBase critter)

        This is the attack method of tower. It has the similar way as other tower's attack method. It will attack if a critter should be attacked based on the critter's location, the critter's hp and the tower's strategy.

        The ice tower would make the critter move slowly, and decrease the critter's hp.

        Parameters:
        critter - The critter which should be check if it is the attack target of the tower.
